messages.title: SAM SAYS...
messages.content: I live, work and grew up in Muswell Hill. I firmly believe we need to embrace sustainability so I’m standing to give us a positive Green voice. Only the Greens will stand up for our environment and our children’s future. We’ll fight for clean air and against Labour’s reckless development plans. Please Vote Green.

messages.title: THIS ELECTION ISN’T ABOUT THE NEXT FIVE YEARS. IT’S ABOUT THE NEXT FIFTY YEARS.
messages.content:
Only the Green Party is offering you a vote on the final terms of the Brexit deal. Only the Green Party has the vision to deliver an alternative future for this country, and place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics.
To build affordable homes and to provide properly funded public services. And to put power back in your hands through a citizen’s democracy. If you agree with us, stand with us. The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up. But it’s in your hands – vote Green to make a difference. Stand with us for housing, schools, our NHS, our environment, and our future. We stand up for what matters.

To put power back in your hands through a citizen’s democracy.
We’ll fight for clean air and against Labour’s reckless development plans.
